top.description: Computer Science Society is a community for students interested in CS beyond the classroom to meet, communicate, and try new things. There will be activities and events for all students looking to dive deeper into the understanding of CS through coding, networking, and career help. We hope to see you at one of our various events to learn more.

who_we_are.description: We are a club founded in Kalamazoo College whose goal is to create a path for students to more of an opportunity and resources when trying to start a career in the CS field.

items.name: Mentorship
items.detail: We offer a computer science mentorship for those who are interested in learning more about the field about the different aspects of computer science, including programming, data structures, algorithms, and more.

items.name: Networking
items.detail: We provide support and networking opportunities, organizing events, or advocating for the field of computer science.

items.name: Gaming
items.detail: Game night is offered throughout the term. Everyone is welcome to join and make friends :)

items.name: Resume Help
items.detail: We can help you start with your first resume and give tips to improve your resume.

items.name: Projects
items.detail: They are a great way for students to get involved in the society, learn more to build applications, and boost your resume.

items.name: Community
items.detail: CSS gather people with the same interest and connect with people working in the industry.
